text: Greenhills is a suburb of New Zealand's southernmost city, Invercargill. A quaint but sturdy community with a lush grasslands and home of the "THREE SISTERS". landmark of three mountains visible from Invercargill and surrounding lands. The population was 846 in the 2013 census. This was an increase of 105 people since the 2006 Census. ==References== Category:Suburbs of Invercargill
title: Greenhills, New Zealand
